header.title: Hi, I am Tamas.
header.statement: I am a self-taught web developer who is looking for his first full-time front-end position.

description.paragraph: A big part of my bachelor programme revolved around HTML, CSS and JS in the late 2000s, and while I continued my master programme with a social/political science angle and later worked as a teacher in several different institutions, my interest in coding in general never wavered.
In 2019, I refreshed my HTML, CSS and JS knowledge and in early 2020 completed Udacity's FrontEnd NanoDegree Program. Then continued with learning React and its ecosystem.
I have spent this last year building projects small and big to expand my knowledge in various directions.
Some of the techs I have been working with:

list.title: Star Wars Keys
list.subtitle: project-001
list.description: One of the many small vanilla HTML/CSS/JS projects I have built as practice.

list.title: News Index
list.subtitle: project-002a
list.description: A React/Express application that fetches and displays news items from a third-party API based on various country/category selection.

list.title: Central Kanto Pokemon Database
list.subtitle: project-003
list.description: A pokemon themed React/Express application that imitates a subscription-based service site with pricing offers, form submit pages and a search functionality serving a public API database. Form submits are saved in a MongoDB database.

list.title: Evrallas
list.subtitle: project-004
list.description: Evrallas is a choose-your-own-adventure story game. The application includes multiple adventures to choose from, account statistics and achievement tracking, resetting account progress, different colour themes and more.

list.title: Portfolio Site
list.subtitle: project-005
list.description: The site is a simple Gatsby generated static site to showcase some of my projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.statement: Feel free to reach out via email or LinkedIn!
